name: Soldier
description: You began training for war as a youth, drilling with weapons and performing forced marches in heavy armor. The horrors of battle have steeled your resolve and given you a ruthless edge in combat.

features.name: Savage Attacker
features.description: You've trained to deal particularly damaging strikes. Once per turn when you hit a target with a weapon, you can roll the damage dice twice and use either roll against the target.
